songs.title: Do You Think of Me
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I wonder if you think of me
Somewhere in the shadows of your mind
Although our love could never be
I find I think about you all the time
Am I in your fantasies?
The way you always wander into mine
And are you longing endlessly
Just like me deep inside?

[Chorus]
When the nights are dark and cold
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
And when you're lying all alone
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
When you feel the touch of another love
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
Am I the one you're dreaming of?
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?

[Verse 2]
I picture you embracing me
We drift away and leave the world behind
But it's only make-believe
Love can be so unkind

[Chorus]
When the nights are dark and cold
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
And when you're lying all alone
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
When you feel the touch of another love
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
Am I the one you're dreaming of?
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?

[Bridge]
Tell me, baby
Tell me, baby

[Chorus]
When the nights are dark and cold
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
And when you're lying all alone
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
When you feel the touch of another love
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
Am I the one you're dreaming of?
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
When the nights are dark and cold
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
And when you're lying all alone
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
When you feel the touch of another love
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?
Am I the one you're dreaming of?
Do you think of me?
Do you think of me?

[Outro]
'Cause I think about you, baby
When I'm all alone
I think of you, yes, I do
